~IAkDeviceProfile
virtual IAkStreamProfile* AK::IAkDeviceProfile::GetStreamProfile ( AkUInt32  in_uStreamIndex  )  [pure virtual]

Get a stream profile, for a specified stream index.

Remarks:
GetStreamProfile() refers to streams by index, which must honor the call to AK::IAkDeviceProfile::GetNumStreams().
See also:
  • streamingdevicemanager
Parameters:
in_uStreamIndex Stream index: [0,numStreams[
